content: It's very sad an unfit mother would rather have her child stay in foster care than go with the baby's father and go as far as throwing him
in jail for false accusations just so he can't have the child. Btw the child's mother is a fucking crack head who just got out of prison
for falling asleep at a stop light and having heroin and meth while the child was also in the car. It's a fucking shame. Smfh.
